metamask.title: Metamask
metamask.lockedMessage: Metamask is locked. Please unlock it and try again.
metamask.loginMessage: You can login with Metamask. It will manage private keys for you. No extra password needed.
metamask.notAvailable: Metamask is not available. You need to install Metamask browser extension to use this feature.
metamask.unlockForTransaction: Please make sure Metamask is unlocked to send transaction with account.

empty.title: Oops! No item found on Ethereum chain.
empty.description: We didn’t found any item on Ethereum chain.

empty.title: Oops! No item found on Matic chain.
empty.description: We didn’t found any item on Matic chain.

logout.title: Logout
logout.logoutQuestion: Are you sure want to logout?

process.checkpointed: Checkpoint received. Please confirm Withdraw now.
process.posCheckpointed: Checkpoint received. Please finish the withdraw process now.
process.challengeWait: Waiting for challenge period to end. Please check back after {challengePeriod}
process.challengeEnd: Challenge period ended. Please finish the withdraw process.

process.preDeposit: Please confirm the transaction to complete the deposit.
process.depositing: Waiting for 12 block confirmation. It may take upto 5 min.
process.deposited: It will take ~2 minute to reflact in your account.
